trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Birmingham
There were no other sightings in Birmingham on or around September 2nd 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsHad packed up after a night at the roadhouse and was having a cigarette with three others. Thought we saw a Chinese lantern but then it changed colour which caught our attention, then it moved very quickly against the wind then changed direction two or three times, changing colour each time. Finally it came to a direct halt and shot straight upwards leaving a glowing trail behind it.
Summary: Near the Roundhouse in Birmingham late night, calm and witnessed by 4 people
